channel.title: NEW QUESTION:Domain question
channel.description: New question: what provider is the best to buy from? e.g. i want to be able to put a web client and smf on my website what would be the best one to buy one from?

item.title: NEW QUESTION:Domain question
item.dc:creator: @Vermillion1 Vermillion™
item.description:
@Vermillion1 wrote:

[quote=“solemage2, post:7, topic:149892”]no joke, SMF is Open Source…
Buy a domain and get some hosting and just upload smf into it…[/quote]
alright that helps out thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: NEW QUESTION:Domain question
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

you can get a smf forum for 10 bucks a year by buying domain name and then using a freehosting site such as ulmb awardspace or freehostia. or you could by shared hosting for a smaller forum which i assume would be at least 10 dollars a month, so 130 bucks a year with a domain name.

or you could buy dedicated hosting for a larger forum for more $, but i don’t think this is neccessarry.

Read full topic

item.title: NEW QUESTION:Domain question
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

Vermillion™:

I am going to buy a domain soon and i was wondering if there was a provider that gives an option to have a forum on the domain. I don’t want to spend allot of money having a smf forum and a domain any help?

It depends on who’s hosting the site, not the domain provider.

Read full topic
